directions: Blend yogurt, mayonnaise, mustard, pickle juice, capers, horseradish, garlic, hot pepper sauce, cayenne, and paprika together in the bowl of a food processor. Chill until ready to serve, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
title: Spicy Remoulade Sauce
